author: felixweber
title: Mission& Vision driven SPO Networks
description: Pools set up to support the building of the Catalyst community & infrastructure are underrepresented in the ecosystem.
solution: Create an innovative network of Catalyst-focused SPOs, work with prominent Catalyst builders & document their SPO journey.
experience: Assembly of established & engaged Catalyst Community Projects, SPOs, Catalyst Circle Members, Funded Proposers, Community Advisors & Mentors
